Coyote's Own
Outwit and probability control aren't defense powers.
April 9, 2022
jimmyboy
If you play sidekicks then you know how effective they can be. He will allow a sidekick to choose something like prob control, outwit, impervious, etc. That's HUGE. The trick is to play him on a theme team with sidekicks.
January 28, 2022
muel0017
[QUOTE=Goop;12170319]Feels overcosted for 75pts. I'm not even sure who that sidekick bonus is suppose to help? A kree/soldier team maybe? He does have some decent attack/dmg values so he's OK at best. Mastermind on close attacks is tough to pull off. If you like Taskmaster check out the awesome one in the starter.[/QUOTE] He's worth 75pts for his combat values and dial length alone. 11/18/3 atk/def/dmg is good. 8 clicks is good. His keywords are good. If I were going to use him I wouldn't even bother with the Sidekick bs and just use him for his Leadership, Wild Card TA, and combat values.
January 3, 2022
The Singularity
Well the sculpt is really cool looking in person. Tony works best by himself - so the sidekick gimmick feels a little odd here but also it just seems empty for Taskmaster. He's a walking swiss army knife of powers and abilities but this dial is just so lackluster for his MO.
December 29, 2021
